English: Can't sell it now, work in progress.
column3: Can't sell it now, work in progress.

English: Can't clear now, work in progress.
column3: Can't clear now, work in progress.

English: First you need to sell individual animals.
column3: First you need to sell individual animals.

English: Urge sun to rise for a few rubies? It loves glowing gems...
Are you sure you want to destroy this?
No cash left. Would you like to buy some for rubies?
You don't have enough rubies. Would you like to buy some?
Not enough resources. Would you like to go to inventory to buy some?
Not enough cash. You can sell your resources to get cash. Go to inventory?
Animals sense their dead comrades. Destroy this cursed corral.
This item has been already purchased.
Please rate this app to keep updates coming. Should we go to the review?
Are you sure you want to exit? You will lose your progress since the start of the day.
Hey, you seem to be offline. When you are online, you can get updated information about the game. It could be important.
This is a demo version. If you like this game, why not upgrade to the full version? Visit our website for more information.
We're looking for help on the farm... Do you have a while? This game is auto-updated if you are connected to the internet. You will be asked to allow installation of updates.
If you experience problems with DirectX, use the OpenGL renderer instead.
You already have the latest version
Update will be installed the next time you start the game.
Stop checking for updates for now
Update is ready to be installed.
Nice picnic spot built for high society centuries ago. The village wasn't yet founded.
Let's give people some privacy in a small booth.
A splendid shrine was once here. Vandals destroyed it.
There was a nice flower patch, but a goat destroyed it. We need to buy flowers.
This naked scarecrow has no respect whatsoever. He would like a suit.
This was a statue of Venus, but now it's like "where is my head?"
It's a disaster that this well was filled in. We need to call some digging experts.
Build a number of $PARAM tiles ($NUM2 of $NUM1 remaining).
We need to produce a certain amount of $PARAM ($NUM2 of $NUM1 remaining).
Raise a number of animals $PARAM ($NUM2 of $NUM1 remaining).
Cut down old trees and clear rocks out of $NUM1 tiles ($NUM2 remaining).
I like horses and sheep the most.
I would like to be an animal doctor.
I don't eat anything but organic food.
I would love to live on an organic farm.
Traps don't seem to work on these little monsters.
Do goblins live in holes or caves?
So many goblins in the night. Any dungeons nearby?
Once I catch one of these, I will teach it manners!
I will finish it if you have any scraps left.
You are a snob. I eat anything they give me.
If you don't like gruel, don't say it's not good.
I'm grateful for the opportunity to act in this simulation.
What about giving this a 5-star review in the AppStore?
I hope that my part in this comedy will make me famous.
If you are really good, you will get out of it.
I smell it, too. Someone hasn't taken a shower for ages.
That's the smell of the countryside.
Don't smoke! Eat a carrot instead.
Be careful with fire. Straw catches fire easily.
Have you heard goblins raising hell at night?
It's been completely trampled down by these midgets!
A goblin has been making faces at me through my window.
It's too hot for me in town. Nice hideout here.
It was love at first sight.
I need a hideout for a while. What about here?
Goodfolks, can anyone spare me a cigarette?
Red sky at night: shepherd's delight.
I'm going to sleep like the dead.
I'm exhausted. Give me a break!
OK, I will just finish my meal.
I hate $FOOD! It's just not good for me.
I wonder if I could have a portion of $FOOD.
I hope we are not having $FOOD today.
Eat to live, don't live to eat.
Not bad. Could use a little ketchup.
This game is a work of art.
I would like to retire if I could.
He has a gift for driving me crazy.
... leaky rooftop for years and his lordship doesn't care!
I'm back from the town old man. Are you finished yet?
What the hell are you doing here?
Happy wife, happy life... This explains my tragedy.
I would like to restore this abandoned village.
I'm too young to retire, don't you agree?
Hurrah! I love working with animals.
Wanna hear a joke? A giraffe walks into a bar...
If you are good, you will get all the work.
When you don't know what to do, walk fast and look worried.
All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.
If a thing is worth doing, it's worth doing well.
Maybe I will stay here for longer than I used to.
I'm not looking for another guy. Maybe later...
This is the coolest community I have ever been in.
Finally here! I've heard a lot about this place.
I love sunsets and red skies at night.
I no longer enjoyed living in the city.
What a place! I like it very much.
Is it really worth being here?
I'm fine. Thank you for asking.
What a lovely day this is.
Great food and nice weather. I'm loving it!
Every day is a new beginning.
The sun's setting. I'm going home.
Make hay while the sun shines.
Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy.
Mm, what air... Can you smell it, too?
Here, it's me who is the boss! (illusion, isn't it?)
I wanted to settle down for a long time.
They closed down our factory. I'm looking for a job.
Mamma mia! The food here is really horrid.
I miss the sea. A fish pond is no substitute.
Ciao! No jobs in the south. I hope not much work here.
Change is in the air. We are the 99%!
To plant something we need to invest from our stock.
Here is our stock of vegetables. In this game, a vegetable is just a vegetable.
And when it grows, it's just a vegetable. How many pieces and how much time it takes.
Clear? Tap to select crop and confirm with button.
Collect harvested vegetable. There are a few other basic resources in this game: grain, fruit, eggs, etc.
If characters run out of energy, they will do nothing until the evening. Energy is refilled by food and sleep. It's time to cook something...
Each recipe requires various ingredients. If you are missing a resource, the number turns red.
You can see the stock level for required resources here.
Energy gained by eating this food.
Happiness points gained for each portion eaten.
Tap to select the recipe. This is an easy food; it will be done in a minute...
Trees die with age or when we don't prune them.
Build another patch by dragging icon and dropping over an empty tile.
Time to eat! Each character will tell you his favourite meal (+1 happiness bonus) when you let him talk by tapping.
Animals are hungry and need to eat. They die after days of starving!
You can speed up time by holding the >> button.
Harvest moon! Tell greybeard to harvest yields by tapping on the tile. Tap again to cancel this command.
In this game, you gradually restore an abandoned village. There are houses and other objects which need repair.
Order someone to repair the house.
Keep an eye on what you have on stock.
You can manage resources here. Let's sell some vegetables for coins.
Select quantity to be sold. Notice that per unit prices increase with quantity.
You can also buy resources and coins for rubies.
Happiness points gained for good food accumulate. You can see how many points are needed for next level.
The more people the more fun. Let's speed things up with rubies.
The first day is about to end. Folks are going to sleep. The game will be saved and the next day starts with a sunrise.
We are going to build a new patch. Go to planning mode.
Drag the icon with the vegetable patch and drop it over an empty tile.
You can also remove built objects in this mode.
There are workers on the place.
Please wait, the meal is cooking...
The next food preparation will be allowed only after this food is eaten.
The tree has to be fertilised.
Repair the house to unlock this area.
Congratulations! The people in your village are so happy that the overall happiness raised to level $VAL.
This house is ill-conditioned. You will need to repair the house to make it habitable again.
A new character will arrive in the village when happiness reaches level $NUM.
Changes will apply after the game is restarted.
Good job with this quest. Here's your reward.
Congratulations! You've gained enough experience points for level $VAL. New possibilities are open for you...
Expand the panel with two day-savers so you can refill 3 days and play in a row.|Bonus: removes advertising.
Expand the panel with two day-savers so you can refill 5 days and play in a row.
